subject: Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Bernard Lagat steered clear of trouble at the start of the 1,500 meters at the Adidas Track Classic, which more closely resembled a Nascar race than a footrace.
snippet: Bernard Lagat steered clear of trouble at the start of the 1,500 meters at the Adidas Track Classic, which more closely resembled a Nascar race than a footrace.
